item.title: [CXF-7747] FileUtils.maybeDeleteDefaultTempDir causes an IllegalStateException if it tries to remove the shutdown hook while the JVM is already shutting down
item.description:

comments.comment: Can you try it with CXF 3.2.4 instead in case it's already been fixed?
I have already tried it. This problem still exists.
How do I see the corresponding modified code in the CXF project? The latest tag in the project is cxf-3.2.4.
It's fixed on the CXF master branch. 3.2.5 will be released in a couple of weeks.
